bspAutoCopyBookmarklet.js.name: Copy Bookmarklet
bspAutoCopyBookmarklet.js.desc: Copies the following Reservation Data: Pick Up/ Drop Off-Station, Date and Time. Then opens the simulation BSP simulation Page in a new tab.

bspAutoFillBookmarklet.js.name: Fill Bookmarklet
bspAutoFillBookmarklet.js.desc: Fills in the simulation page with previously copied data from a reservation. Disclaimer can only be used together with 'Copy - BSP Resa'
